name: Microservices Demo
description: Multi-service architecture with API Gateway, auth, and databases
dockerCompose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  api-gateway:
    image: nginx:alpine
    ports:
      - '80:80'
    volumes:
      - ./nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro
    depends_on:
      - auth-service
      - user-service
      - product-service

  auth-service:
    image: node:20-alpine
    working_dir: /app
    ports:
      - '3001:3001'
    environment:
      - PORT=3001
      - REDIS_URL=redis://redis:6379
      - JWT_SECRET=your-secret-key
    volumes:
      - ./services/auth:/app
    command: npm start
    depends_on:
      - redis

  user-service:
    image: node:20-alpine
    working_dir: /app
    ports:
      - '3002:3002'
    environment:
      - PORT=3002
      - DATABASE_URL=postgresql://user:password@postgres:5432/users
    volumes:
      - ./services/user:/app
    command: npm start
    depends_on:
      - postgres

  product-service:
    image: node:20-alpine
    working_dir: /app
    ports:
      - '3003:3003'
    environment:
      - PORT=3003
      - DATABASE_URL=postgresql://user:password@postgres:5432/products
    volumes:
      - ./services/product:/app
    command: npm start
    depends_on:
      - postgres

  postgres:
    image: postgres:16-alpine
    ports:
      - '5432:5432'
    environment:
      - POSTGRES_USER=user
      - POSTGRES_PASSWORD=password
      - POSTGRES_DB=myapp
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data

  redis:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    ports:
      - '6379:6379'
    volumes:
      - redis_data:/data

volumes:
  postgres_data:
  redis_data:
